Package cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEntitlementServiceAPI
    Public interface for the EntitlemntServiceAPI.
    IEntitlementVisitable
    Interface that marks implementing classes as able to accept an IEntitlementVisitor for building up a printable product inventory.
    IEntitlementVisitor
    Interface for defining the visit methods that the implementing class must overwrite; follows the Visitor pattern.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessToken
    AccessTokens are used for authorization purposes.
    Credentials
    User objects may have multiple sets of credentials; a Credential essentially consists of the username and password combination that a User will use to login and logout of the IEntitlementServiceAPI, which will create an AccessToken that they may use to carry out restricted interface methods.
    Entitlement
    Abstract parent class for Role and Permission.
    EntitlementImporter
    Provides a single public method for handling the creation of new Entitlement Service items, which include: User Role Permission cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.Service Requires a text file be passed that contains the definitions of all items.
    EntitlementServiceAPI
    Concrete implementation class of the EntitlementServiceAPI.
    EntitlementVisitor
    Used to aid in building up a printable inventory of the IEntitlementServiceAPI to list out all the cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlement.Service, Entitlement (which are subclassed as Roles and Permissions), and User.
    Item
    Abstract class representing an entitlement item (could be a Role, Permission, or Resource) that is included in the HouseMate Model Entitlement Service.
    PasswordHash
    PBKDF2 salted password hashing.
    Permission
    Permissions represent actions that registered Users may carry out on the IEntitlementServiceAPI, IHouseMateModelServiceAPI, and cscie97.asn4.housemate.controller.IHouseMateControllerServiceAPI.
    Resource
    Resources represent the major functional areas of the House Mate Service, which now includes the EntitlementServiceAPI, HouseMateControllerServiceAPI, and HouseMateModelServiceAPI.
    Role
    Roles represent aggregations of Permissions and other Roles.
    RoleIterator
    Allows for the iteration of Role items, which may contain child Roles or Permissions.
    User
    Registered Users may call restricted interface methods on each of the cscie97.asn4.housemate.entitlment.IEntitlementServiceAPI, IHouseMateModelServiceAPI, and cscie97.asn4.housemate.controller.IHouseMateControllerServiceAPI services, as long as the User has the appropriate Entitlements.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PermissionType
    Enumeration of all Permission types that the IEntitlementServiceAPI uses, as well as the Permission types that are used by the cscie97.asn4.housemate.model.IHousemateModelServiceAPI and cscie97.asn4.housemate.controller.IHouseMateControllerServiceAPI.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AccessDeniedException
    Exception for problems that the IEntitlementServiceAPI encounters when users attempt to carry out a restricted interface method without the appropriate credentials.
    InvalidAccessTokenException
    Exception for problems that the IEntitlementServiceAPI, may run into during typical operation.
